full_summary:
## Project Title: Intermediate Training Facilitator
### Solicitation Number: W7809A124028/A
### Date: August 14, 2023

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Intermediate Training Facilitator services. This procurement is being conducted in accordance with the Supply Arrangement for Learning Services, Category E60ZH-2100LS, for the National Capital Region.

## Description of Work

The DND requires the services of two (2) Intermediate Training Facilitators for a period of one (1) year, with optional extensions of one (1) year each. The facilitators will provide training delivery services, which may involve designing, developing, and delivering training programs to DND personnel.

## Requirements

* The successful bidder must be a qualified supplier under the Learning Services Supply Arrangement, Category E60ZH-2100LS.
* The facilitators must have intermediate training facilitator skills and experience.
* Security clearance is not required.
* Document safeguarding is not required.
* The work will be performed in the National Capital Region.

## Tendering Procedure

This is a selective tendering process, open only to qualified suppliers under the Learning Services Supply Arrangement, Category E60ZH-2100LS.

## Contracting Entity

* The contracting authority is Viktoria Melnichuk, Manager, Contracting and Procurement.
* Email: Viktoria.Melnichuk@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 302-1534

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and other applicable trade agreements.

## Resources

For further information regarding this procurement, please refer to the PSPC's Contact Acquisitions page.

## Attachments

The RFP document can be downloaded from the CanadaBuys website: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8121/w24028a---npp-learning-services%28ab.pdf>

**Please note that the deadline for submission is August 25, 2023 at 14:00 PM (EDT).** The DND reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier.

## Language

The RFP document is available in English and French.
